backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing deposit transactions with 20% tax calculation, winning records, user profiles, currency conversion, and admin/user authorization using access control and migration logic.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old deposit transactions to new format by adding a taxAmount field calculated as 20% of the converted KES amount.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting three completed features for displaying tax breakdowns in DepositSection, AdminFundsReleaseSection, and admin release history table.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing JSON summaries of frontend components including DepositSection with 20% tax calculation display and various profile/admin management components.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles with OKLCH color system defining light and dark mode variables for Betika green theme and UI components.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Betika Casino application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for AdminPage and rendering Toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Access denied screen component displaying login prompt with Internet Identity authentication button for unauthenticated users.
frontend/src/components/AdminFundsReleas: Admin component displaying pending payouts with 20% tax breakdown showing gross amount, tax deduction, and net payout with release confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/BalanceCard.tsx: Component displaying user's account balance in KSh with green gradient background and wallet icon (content truncated in source).
frontend/src/components/BettingHistorySe: Component showing betting history with summary cards and data table of bets (content truncated in source).
frontend/src/components/DataTable.tsx: Reusable table component with customizable columns, optional formatting functions, and empty state handling for displaying tabular data.
frontend/src/components/DepositSection.t: React component for initiating deposits with multi-currency support, M-PESA payment instructions, tax calculations (20%), and exchange rate conversions to KES.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that manages backend actor creation with Internet Identity authentication, handles admin token initialization, and invalidates dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for deposit operations (initiate/confirm), admin fund release management (pending winners, release history), and admin role verification with mock data implementations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, Betika green brand colors, and utility classes for consistent styling across the application.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page with access control, displaying fund release management interface, release history table with tax calculations, and summary cards for holding account information.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration for parameter persistence across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color schemes (including OKLCH color space), container settings, border radius variables, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a BETIKA-like betting/casino app with existing features including user profiles, authentication, phone verification, payment deposits, M-PESA integration (paybill 400004), multi-currency support, and 20% tax deductions.
